questions.question: Which of the following spectroscopy techniques is mainly used to determine functional groups in organic compounds?

explanations.c: Nitrogen reacts with sodium to form sodium cyanide (NaCN), which is water-soluble and detectable.

questions.question: In UV-Visible spectroscopy, which transition is primarily responsible for absorption in conjugated systems?

explanations.c: Sulphur forms Na₂S, which gives a black precipitate of PbS with lead acetate.
